PhysicalResource.description: Physical resource is a type of resource that describes the common set of attributes shared by all concrete physical resources (e.g. EQUIPMENT) in the inventory.

manufactureDate.description: This is a string attribute that defines the date of manufacture of this item in the fixed format "dd/mm/yyyy". This is an optional attribute.

powerState.description:
This defines the current power status of the hardware item. Values include:

  0:  Unknown
  1:  Not Applicable
  2:  No Power Applied
  3: Full Power Applied
  4:  Power Save - Normal
  5:  Power Save - Degraded
  6:  Power Save - Standby
  7:  Power Save - Critical
  8:  Power Save - Low Power Mode
  9:  Power Save - Unknown
 10: Power Cycle
 11: Power Warning
 12: Power Off

serialNumber.description: This is a string that represents a manufacturer-allocated number used to identify different instances of the same hardware item. The ModelNumber and PartNumber attributes are used to identify different types of hardware items. This is a REQUIRED attribute.

versionNumber.description: This is a string that identifies the version of this object. This is an optional attribute.

category.description: Category of the concrete resource. e.g Gold, Silver for MSISDN concrete resource

endDate.description: A date time( DateTime). The date till the resource is effective

href.description: The URI for the object itself.

id.description: Identifier of an instance of the resource. Required to be unique within the resource type.  Used in URIs as the identifier for specific instances of a type.

lifecycleState.description: The life cycle state of the resource.

name.description: A string used to give a name to the resource

startDate.description: A date time( DateTime). The date from which the resource is effective

version.description: A field that identifies the specific version of an instance of a resource.
